field.name: p_ino
field.comment: inode number of the parent directory

field.name: dev
field.comment: ID of the device containing the file

field.name: mode
field.comment: the file's mode bits (type and permissions)

field.name: nlink
field.comment: number of hard links to the file

field.name: atime
field.comment: time of last access (seconds since epoch)

field.name: mtime
field.comment: time of last modification (seconds since epoch)

field.name: ctime
field.comment: time of last status change (seconds since epoch)
